com.google.android.apps.camera.ui.prefer.android:summary: Shutter sound will enable while capturing photos

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Camera 2api settings
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: The app can detect your device hardware level as JPEG or YUV.Try to use YUV format,If its supported.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Device interface
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Huge flags get enabled by default according to device selection.

ListPreference.android:title: Front lens
ListPreference.android:summary: Few flags will be got enabled according to device selection: %s

ListPreference.android:summary: Few flags will be got enabled according to device selection: %s

ListPreference.android:title: ID5 lens
ListPreference.android:summary: Few flags will be got enabled according to device selection: %s

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Device selection for hdr
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: The option for getting different HDR method according to device selection.

ListPreference.android:title: Front lens
ListPreference.android:summary: HDR algorithm would be changed according to the device selection: %s

ListPreference.android:title: Main lens
ListPreference.android:summary: HDR algorithm would be changed according to the device selection: %s

ListPreference.android:title: Tele lens
ListPreference.android:summary: HDR algorithm would be changed according to the device selection: %s

ListPreference.android:title: Wide lens
ListPreference.android:summary: HDR algorithm would be changed according to the device selection: %s

ListPreference.android:title: ID4 lens
ListPreference.android:summary: HDR algorithm would be changed according to the device selection: %s

ListPreference.android:title: ID5 lens
ListPreference.android:summary: HDR algorithm would be changed according to the device selection: %s

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Google sensor logic
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Google sensor logic is google Id which will allow you to get advantage of different hdr+ functions.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Select sensor size
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Can fix image resolution by selecting sensor size.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Sabre and merge algorithm
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Improved saber algorithm, you need to test it yourself and turn it on as needed.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Motion photo resolution
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Long press on camera mode shutter button and motion photo video's resolution.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Raw settings
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: RAW Format Settings. It would help you to fix sensor size of HDR+ processing.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: SpatialGainMap fix
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: If lens shading map values not exist on c2api files, then enable SpatialGainMap fix.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Upscaling photos
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Will be able to upscal the image size according to selections.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Exposure Compensation
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Bigger values selection will be increased brightness and lower values selection will be decrease brightness of images.

com.google.android.apps.camera.ui.prefer.android:title: Enable exposure compensation
com.google.android.apps.camera.ui.prefer.android:summary: This item will only take effect when the exposure compensation setting is turned on.

ListPreference.android:title: Front lens
ListPreference.android:summary: The exposure compensation value is: %s.

ListPreference.android:summary: The exposure compensation value is: %s.

ListPreference.android:summary: The exposure compensation value is: %s.

ListPreference.android:summary: The exposure compensation value is: %s.

ListPreference.android:summary: The exposure compensation value is: %s.

ListPreference.android:title: Portrait mode
ListPreference.android:summary: The exposure compensation value is: %s.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Color transmission
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Would be able to fix less color issues and it will only work if awb is off.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Noise modelers
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: For Getting perfect color of your sensor have to enable it.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Auto white balance
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: For Getting perfect color of your sensor have to enable it.

com.google.android.apps.camera.ui.prefer.android:title: Enable awb
com.google.android.apps.camera.ui.prefer.android:summary: Would be able to use awb sensor values

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Manual Focus Settings
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Would work on all modes. Would be able to customize focal lengths.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Viewfinder buttons
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Would be able to enable different buttons and sliders.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Astro And Night
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Would only work on night mode. Would be able to customize focal lengths.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Video settings
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Bitrate, slowmo fps, video resolution exist on it. Can customize it on your way.

com.google.android.apps.camera.ui.prefer.android:title: Enable manual resolution
com.google.android.apps.camera.ui.prefer.android:summary: If you enable it, video resolution toggle won't work. Resolution have the be customize from here.

com.google.android.apps.camera.ui.prefer.android:title: Enable manual fps selection
com.google.android.apps.camera.ui.prefer.android:summary: If automatic doesn't work, select fps from here manually.
